item.title: 【Requests】[REQ AUD] - I Saw The TV Glow (Original Soundtrack) - QoBuz FLAC rip
item.description:
Hello!

I was wondering if anyone could please rip the highest quality obtainable uncompressed files from Qobuz? This album is not available in bandcamp so this is the highest quality obtainable.

https://www.qobuz.com/us-en/album/i-saw-the-tv-glow-various-artists/bfcf9k5i21h1b

Thanks!
item.author: conleg
